description:
From the summit to downtown in winter, the Eva down jacket will keep you protected and warm. With its down and feather mix all packaged in a polyester shell, it will wrap you in warmth and protect you from the elements. Additional stretch panels under the arms and at the sides make this freedom of movement at its warmest.

  • 100% polyester shell fabric to keep you protected when a light flurry comes by
  • Stretchy polyester under the arms and at the sides add mobility
  • The down and feather mix provides lightweight warmth
  • Sides pockets give you room for essentials or your hands when you’re taking in the summit views
  • A slim fit is perfect for layering or on its own
name: Kari Traa Eva Down Jacket - Women's
